entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
